trends: There have been 32 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around July 9th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside just beginning to have a smoke, when I looked at the moon and then noticed what I thought to be a bright star. When I noticed it was moving I then thought, thats a big plane. Then as it was ascending to what appeared to be space I was in awe. I followed the object as it appeared to turn into a satellite. I followed its path as if it were a satellite until I was no longer able to track it with my naked eye. Thinking back it was pretty graceful and it must have been going very fast. The thing that got me the most which thinking back kinda excludes a helicopter or plane is that I've watched satellites moving in orbit before and that is exactly how the object moved at the end of my viewing. If I had to estimate it must have been no longer than 14 secs for the entire viewing. There were two other planes across the sky I noticed after my viewing. They had red flashing lights.
Summary: Strange ascending object viewed as it turned into what appeared a satellite.
